snippet: The brand that began a decade ago as a column in Men’s Health magazine and expanded into a popular book series, will add a quarterly magazine, available on newsstands Tuesday.
abstract: Meredith Corporation is introducing quarterly magazine called Eat This, Not That!, based on column that began decade ago in Men's Health and has expanded into series of books that have sold seven million copies; company is starting magazine after reaching long-sought agreement with David Zinczenko, former editor in chief of Men's Health who began writing the column in 2004.
lead_paragraph: The brand that began a decade ago as a column in Men’s Health magazine and expanded into a popular book series, will add a quarterly magazine, available on newsstands Tuesday.

headline.main: Popular ‘Eat This, Not That!’ Brand to Start Quarterly Magazine
headline.print_headline: A Popular Brand for Healthy Eating Starts a Quarterly Magazine
